trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Brownsville
There were no other sightings in Brownsville on or around November 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe (4 of us) notice object heading south from Harlingen while we were out playing golf, at first we thought it was a helo or airplane but as it got closer to our location we could clearly see that it was not an aircraft of any type or drone. It made no noise, it just hovered above for a few minutes then it disappeared, flew straight up, no engine noise nothing. The object did not have any marking, wing, rotors, etc., and it was no weather balloon or what have you. I am attaching the pictures I took with my camera, if you zoom into the object it is no airplane. This incident happened around 1300 and lasted for about 20 minutes or so..............at first we thought it was a helo or aircraft, we even thought it was a balloon or a bird but as it got closer we noticed that it was nothing that we have seen before. And no we were not drinking..............
